problem: 如图,小明从点A向北偏东80°方向走到B点,又从B点向南偏西25°方向走到点C,则∠ABC的度数为()
comment: 本题考查方位角的概念,正确画出方位角是解题关键.
problem_en: As shown in the figure, Xiaoming walks from point A in the direction of N_0 to the north by east to point B, and then from point B to the direction of N_1 to the south by west to point C, then the degree of ∠ABC is ()
